item.title: GrapheneOS App Suggestions
item.description: GrapheneOS app suggestions GrapheneOS is an opensource operating system for Pixel phones aimed to be the most secure and private OS for mobile phones. It has some flaws as it sandboxes everything even Google Services. But nothing is unusable at least for my usage. Only thing I encounder, some notifications might delay like whatsapp. Here you can find some Tips&Tricks and App suggestions. Tips & Tricks Use work profile for banking apps, just to add an extra layer of security.
